sentences.english: I authorize you to hit 'em a tremendous whack.
sentences.chinese: 我授權你們，向他們放一排狠毒的排槍。

sentences.english: No junketing activity would be conducted on official expenses without permission of the company.
sentences.chinese: 在未得到公司授權情況下，不得以公費進行宴請活動。

sentences.english: The Distributor is authorized to sub-contract and assign the distribution and sales of the Products to sub-contractors of Fangyuan Group.
sentences.chinese: 發行人已授權轉包及銷售此產品給方園集團的轉包商。

sentences.english: Some of the authorization roles mandate that people are assigned to them.
sentences.chinese: 一些授權角色是必不可少的，這些角色上分配了人員。
簽發和管理授權人員名單。

sentences.english: That should see you think his accredit what.
sentences.chinese: 那要看你想給他授權什麼。

sentences.english: Its new resolution authority allows the regulator significant access to systemically relevant firms.
sentences.chinese: 新決議授權監管機構可以有效介入公司相關係統。

sentences.english: Letter of authorization by member to settlement personnel.
sentences.chinese: 會員對清算人員的授權書。

sentences.english: The other likelihood is that you delegated prematurely.
sentences.chinese: 另一種可能性是，你進行了倉促的授權。

sentences.english: When you delegate work, you’ll need to get used to asking other people to take responsibility for something you’d otherwise do yourself.
sentences.chinese: 當你要授權的時候，你必須做到責權對等。

sentences.english: Restricted control on accessing the survey form and information is applied.
sentences.chinese: 資料提取將有嚴格限制，只有授權者才能獲得資料。

sentences.english: The river basin administrative organ subordinated to the Ministry of Water Resources undertakes the hydrologic industrial administrative work as empowered by the Ministry.
sentences.chinese: 水利部所屬流域機構承擔部授權的水文行業管理工作。

sentences.english: He invested his lawyer with complete power to act for him.
sentences.chinese: 他授權律師全權代他訴訟。

sentences.english: Not all states, however, mandate their use.
sentences.chinese: 然而，有些州並未授權使用。

sentences.english: A customer can set up a prestaged transaction that authorizes access to cash to a third party.
sentences.chinese: 客戶可以設置一個預設置交易，授權第三方提取現金。

sentences.english: The company was chartered by the US Congress in 1970.
sentences.chinese: 房地美公司在1970年由美國國會授權特許經營。

definition: entity/substance/thing that has a material existence (as opposed to a conceptual, virtual or online existence)/the real thing (as opposed to an image or model of it)
to publish/to issue (stocks, currency etc)/to release/to distribute (a film)
